ygData.subject: Re: Uh oh....

Yeah, I know Zardus needs to meet him, he's on his way.

::Zardus/Reptilica::

Zardus looks out the window of the shuttle, his mind already planning out the 
next couple of days. The Alliance would move into the Iron Fist, and then, 
from their new, more secure base of operations, they could function more 
efficiently. With superior scanning and state-of-the-art Predacon technology, 
the Iron Fist would be a great asset...

Zardus glances down at his wrist comp, now connected to the main computer of 
the Iron Fist as well as the Alliance base, looking at the scanners. The Iron 
Fist's scanners reported that a location beakon had been picked up, 
obvioustly from a new bot on the planet (That's you, Thrash).

Zardus absently holds on to the nearest chair as the shuttle makes a landing 
at the Alliance base, stopping several feet from Reptilica and Starscream. 
Zardus taps a few buttons on a console, walking toward the door.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica spins around as he is showered by dirt and rocks, looking at the 
shuttle and turning his head to the hatch as it opens, Zardus calmly walking 
out.

"Reptilica, a new bot has sent a location beacon. I've programmed the shuttle 
to track him and go to him. Can you go with the shuttle and recruit this new 
bot? I think his energy signature is Predacon."

Reptilica nods. "Yeah, sure," he says, walking into the shuttle, the hatch 
closing behind him. The shuttle lifts off vertically, hovering for a few 
seconds before zooming off, showering the bots on the ground with more dirt 
and leaves.

Zardus turns to Starscream. "Reptilica said that you wanted to talk to me 
about something?"
